task.instruction: Your user ID is yara_davis_6741. You would like to book a one-way flight for two people from Chicago O'Hare to Detroit Metropolitan Airport on May 28th, in business class. You do not want to depart before 11:00 PM of the 28th or arrive before 2:00 AM of the following day. You prefer a direct flight unless none is available. If multiple options are available, you prefer the cheapest one. Each passenger will have one piece of baggage. You will be making payment using certificate_6761175, certificate_1585255, and credit card ending in 1663. You do not want insurance. Your date of birth is already in the user profile, so you prefer not to provide it again. You will only respond to questions asked by the agent and will not provide any additional information unless prompted.
